name: 3-Cheese Garlic Bread 🥗
description: This classic side dish features a warm and crusty baguette, smothered in a trio of melted cheeses and garlic. Perfect for serving alongside your favorite pasta dish or as a snack all on its own.
instructions: In a bowl, combine all of the ingredients except the baguette, and mix until smooth.
Slice the baguette in half lengthwise, then spread the butter mixture evenly on both sides of the baguette.
Place on a tray lined with parchment paper and bake for about 15 minutes, until cheese is bubbly and starting to brown on the edges.
